price: Biz ayetleri türlü türlü olarak beyan ederiz. Tâ ki onlar, sen (Ehli Kitaptan) öğrendin derler. Biz, (hak ve batılı) bilen kimselere ayetleri böylece açıklamaktayız.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِيَقُولُواْ دَرَسۡتَ وَلِنُبَيِّنَهُۥ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuṣarrifu al-āyāti waliyaqūlū darasta walinubayyinahu liqawmin yaʿlamūna
translations: and that We (may) make it clear
